com.diffplug.common.swt

Class Shells

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.common.swt.Shells

  • public class Shells
extends java.lang.Object
    A fluent builder for creating SWT shells.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Opens the shell on this parent shell.

      Opens the shell on the currently active shell.
      void openOnActiveBlocking()
      Opens the shell on the currently active shell and blocks.

      • setSize

        public Shells setSize(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Point size)
        Sets the size for this Shell. If it is null, the shell will be packed as tightly as possible. If either component is <= 0, the positive dimension will be constrained, and the other dimension will be packed as tightly as possible.

      • openOn
